title: My Brothers Wife Is Up to Something
itunes:title: My Brothers Wife Is Up to Something
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, my brother has been married over fifteen years and we’re a close-knit family. My wife and I went over to our good friends’ house to watch a game and I went to get a beer and my friend’s wife said she needed to show me something but I had to keep it a secret. I was nervous as heck, but I agreed. She took out her phone and showed me a video of my brother’s wife at her front door. It was captured on their security camera...................................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, my brother has been married over fifteen years and we’re a close-knit family. My wife and I went over to our good friends’ house to watch a game and I went to get a beer and my friend’s wife said she needed to show me something but I had to keep it a secret. I was nervous as heck, but I agreed. She took out her phone and showed me a video of my brother’s wife at her front door. It was captured on their security camera...................................
